channel.description: Recent content in devxp on Ogenki

item.title: Helm workshop: Templating exercises
item.description: Test your skills with a few templating challenges

item.title: Helm workshop: Build your first chart
item.description: Learn how to build a chart from scratch

item.title: Helm workshop: Lifecycle operations
item.description: Command lines to manage applications deployed with Helm

item.title: Helm workshop: Ecosystem
item.description: A few useful Helm plugins and tools to extend Helm's features

item.title: Helm workshop: Third party charts
item.description: Most often you won't have to build your own chart from scratch. There are plenty of them available for different software. Learn how to make use of them.

item.title: Helm workshop
item.description: This is a series of workshops dedicated to Helm, the famous Kubernetes package manager. We'll start by preparing your local environment
